entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
